messages.subject: BOOKSELLING - taking it off list
messages.msgSnippet: Hi all, Since this is starting to generate quite a bit of mail, I m taking my part of the bookselling discussion off-list. I will be e-mailing the original
messages.messageBody:
Hi all,

Since this is starting to generate quite a bit of mail, I'm taking my part
of the bookselling discussion off-list. I will be e-mailing the original
poster to answer questions by this Sunday (I'm out buying today and tomorrow
so may not get to it until then). If anyone else would like to be included
in any ensuing discussion with me I'll be happy to send you any of those
e-mails and answer any questions you have, also, just send me a note
PRIVATELY to pamhartley@....

Thanks, and now, back to your regular show. <g>

Pam
